en: Two workers, Sonny Neill and Stella Moser, stand beside a milk delivery truch for J.B. Neill's dairy.  They are dressed in all white and wearing hats.  Neill wears a bow tie and Moser wears a necktie.  The truck features a picture of cow and a picture of a woman holding a baby inside a milk jar.  The slogans, "Safe Milk for Babies" and "Grade A+ Natural Milk" appear on the side of the truck, as does the three-digit city phone number and the five-digit alphanumeric farm phone number for the company.
Era 7 - The Emergence of Modern America (1890-1930)
